title: Once upon a TIME
description: Mankind has always assumed he is master of the planet Earth! In Once upon a Time, Kris Robbins creates a World where a boy, Adam with the strangest birth the World has ever recorded controls TIME itself!His struggle to come to terms with his strange powers finally cause the people that think they control the World to take action against him!The resultant struggle reaches an incredible intensity as Adam harnesses more and more of the power available to him. The climax leaves the future of mankind itself in the balance and Adam must decide on the final, earth shattering, solution!
author: Kris Robbins
